name: MapYourTag
overview:
MapYourTag has been developed to assist Small and Medium-sized Enterprises and others who need to track, manage and get traceability of their assets in ease at the lowest cost.

MapYourTag is a Sofware as a Service (SaaS) which can be used from any regular web browser. MapYourTag allows you to track the location and update the status of you asset from a simple smartphone or a tablet pc. In one single interface get quickly your QR code assigned to your asset with geolocation and updtated status. You get more control in managing your asset on visibility, transparency, traceability, and productivity. You get a better customer service and satisfied customers.

If you manage asset for which you need to check the status and/or the localization, so MapYourTag is for you.

With MapYourTag you track and manage your asset online from your mobile phone with geolocalization enabled.

MapYourTag is made for the following activities:

-Shipping, Logistics and Supply Chain Management -Maintenance, Quality Control, Inspection -Cleaning and Maintaining of Home, Office, Hospital, etc…

Some examples of asset that MapYourTag tracks: engine, office, medical supplies, weighing machines, boiler, spare parts, vehicle, etc…
